doc.after: In 1878 Stoker married Florence Balcombe daughter of Lieutenant Colonel James Balcombe of 1 Marino Crescent She was a celebrated beauty whose former suitor was Oscar Wilde 6 Stoker had known Wilde from his student days having proposed him for membership of the university s Philosophical Society while he was president Wilde was upset at Florence s decision but Stoker later resumed the acquaintanceship and after Wilde s fall visited him on the Continent 7
